com.inmobi.androidsdk
Class IMAdInterstitial

java.lang.Object
  com.inmobi.androidsdk.IMAdInterstitial

public class IMAdInterstitial
extends Object

IMAdInterstitial is used to load interstitial ads. These type of ads occupy the full screen and are modal in nature. Interstitial ads can be used in scenarios such as the loading of an app in the background, or in between level changes of a gaming app.

Constructor Detail

IMAdInterstitial

public IMAdInterstitial(android.app.Activity activity,
                        String appId)
Constructor to create IMAdInterstitial object

Parameters:
activity - The activity on top of which the interstitial ad would be shown.
appId - The InMobi App ID of the application.
Throws:
NullPointerException - If activity OR appId is Null
IllegalArgumentException - If appId is empty
RuntimeException - If InMobiAdNetwork and InMobiCommons SDK jars do not belong to the same SDK bundle

IMAdInterstitial

public IMAdInterstitial(android.app.Activity activity,
                        String appId,
                        long slotId)
Constructor to create IMAdInterstitial object

Parameters:
activity - The activity on top of which the interstitial ad would be shown.
appId - The InMobi App ID of the application.
slotId - Optional InMobi slot ID of the slot (For future use)
Throws:
NullPointerException - If activity OR appId is Null
IllegalArgumentException - If appId is empty
RuntimeException - If InMobiAdNetwork SDK and InMobiCommons SDK jars do not belong to the same SDK bundle
Method Detail

getState

public IMAdInterstitial.State getState()
Get the current state of the interstitial ad.

Returns:
Current state.

loadNewAd

public void loadNewAd()
Loads a new interstitial ad. Ad will not be loaded if the previous ad is currently being loaded, or if the previous ad is being viewed by the user. A minimum of 20 seconds must be maintained between consequent success requests.

loadNewAd

public void loadNewAd(IMAdRequest adRequest)
Loads a new interstitial ad with the supplied IMAdRequest. Ad will not be loaded if the previous ad is currently being loaded, or if the previous ad is being viewed by the user. A minimum of 20 seconds must be maintained between consequent success requests.

Parameters:
adRequest - The IMAdRequest instance with the relevant values set.

show

public void show()
Show the interstitial ad. The state of the interstitial must be 'READY' to show the ad.

Throws:
IllegalStateException - If the interstitial ad is not in the 'READY' state.

getIMAdInterstitialListener

public IMAdInterstitialListener getIMAdInterstitialListener()
Get the IMAdInterstitialListener for this interstitial ad.

Returns:
The imAdInterstitialListener for this ad.

setMode

public void setMode(IMAdInterstitial.AdMode adMode)

stopLoading

public void stopLoading()
Cancel the ad request. If ad fetch is in progress at the time of this call, an ad request failed callback is called with error (AD_FETCH_TIMEOUT)
If ad load/render is in progress at the time of this call, an ad request failed callback is called with error (AD_RENDERING_TIMEOUT).
Other cases does nothing

disableHardwareAcceleration

public void disableHardwareAcceleration()
Calling this method will disable hardware acceleration on the underlying views. Once disabled, it cannot be enabled.

destroy

public void destroy()
Calling this method will close the ad, followed by destroying the underlying views.
